desc: The Cheeseburger Wendy's Burger is a classic fast food burger that packs a punch of flavor in every bite. Made with a juicy beef patty cooked to perfection, it's topped with melted American cheese, crispy lettuce, ripe tomato, and crunchy pickles.
Enjoy our delicious Hamburger Veggie Burger, made with a savory blend of fresh vegetables and herbs, topped with crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, and tangy pickles, all served on a soft, toasted bun.

Our chicken burger is a delicious and healthier alternative to traditional beef burgers, perfect for those looking for a lighter meal option. Try it today and experience the mouth-watering flavors of our Hamburger Chicken Burger!
Indulge in our crispy and savory Fried Chicken Burger, made with a juicy chicken patty, hand-breaded and deep-fried to perfection, served on a warm bun with lettuce, tomato, and a creamy sauce.
Savor our Beef Salad Bowl, featuring tender slices of grilled beef, fresh greens, cherry tomatoes, and crunchy vegetables, drizzled with a light vinaigrette for a hearty yet healthy meal.
Enjoy our Fruit Salad Bowl, packed with a colorful mix of seasonal fruits, leafy greens, and a refreshing honey-lemon dressing, perfect for a sweet and nourishing treat.
Indulge in our Veggie Salad Bowl, loaded with crisp lettuce, bell peppers, cucumbers, carrots, and cherry tomatoes, served with a light dressing to keep it fresh and healthy.
Try our Hawaiian Bowl, a tropical mix of juicy pineapple, fresh greens, colorful vegetables, and tender protein, finished with a tangy dressing for a vibrant and satisfying meal.
Enjoy the timeless fizz of our Classic Coca-Cola, a perfectly chilled drink with the ideal balance of sweetness and bubbles to refresh your day.
Our Chilled Heineken Beer delivers a crisp, smooth flavor with a refreshing finish — perfect to pair with any meal or to simply unwind after a long day.
Savor the bold aroma of black tea blended with a zesty touch of lemon, offering the perfect balance of rich flavor and refreshing citrus notes.
Indulge in our signature Bubble Milk Tea, featuring chewy tapioca pearls and silky milk tea that’s perfectly sweet, smooth, and satisfying with every sip.
Experience the light sparkle of our Fresh Sprite, a crisp lemon-lime soda bursting with refreshment and just the right amount of sweetness.
